name: keys type mouse
description:
This interactive poem has three branches.

[click] - or hold your mouse over a branch to begin
[esc] - return to the branching selection or quit
[f11] - fullscreen

Mouse uses the screen's plane as the ground for its exploration. Use the cursor to reveal, snip and expose the text.

Type is a playground for animating overlapping letterforms. Enter text to begin.

Keys performs its inscription by typing. To advance the text, use the keyboard.
